title: Cloudflare Pages
description: A JAMstack platform for frontend developers to collaborate and deploy websites.
descriptionOfFreePlan: Unlimited Sites, Unlimited bandwidth with global CDN to improve performace

additionalInfo.content: Cloudflare Pages itself doesn't have serverless function, it uses another service called Cloudflare Workers. So if you need more information about the serverless function, you should head to https://workers.cloudflare.com/.
